name: Zippi Achieve
description: Zippi is a secure and intelligent enterprise collaboration platform that is driving productivity by making conversations contextual, intuitive and seamless. Now internal, cross-functional and remote teams can chat, share files and work together more efficiently. Your teams communication is not scattered across emails, meetings and multiple tools, it is at one single place for everyone. Zippi not only helps teams work together, it also aligns conversations to business objectives to keep the focus on whats important.  Teams can achieve more with Zippi, using highly intuitive features like; smart work-groups, focused conversations, contextual task management, polls, appreciation, secure file sharing, AI enabled virtual assistant and much more.  Features:   Collaboration: Remain connected with peers and work groups, a secure method of sharing business data.   Conversations: Contextual conversations which simplify transactions, easy and faster interactions to close open tasks.   Align on business objectives: Define and share objectives with your team. Track and maintain all related conversation threads to focus on whats important.   Task management: Assign, share and add rich context to tasks, within an ongoing conversation. Track deadlines and completed tasks in one place.   Secure data sharing: Share any types of messages, files and links securely - no screenshots, only in-app downloads.   Make decisions as a team: Invite Group members to participate in fun polls.   Highly secure: SSO and SSL encrypted messaging, file sharing, data storage and backup  Note: The Zippi app is designed for use by PeopleStrong Alt customers and requires authorized PeopleStrong Alt credentials.  Screens:  Home: Connect with any one you wish to from your organization over a chat.  Group: Stay connected with peers and work groups, a secure method of sharing business data.  Favourites: Tag your frequent contact in favourite window and reach out to them in a single tap.  My profile: Build your profile and view peers profile for details, integrate your profiles with your social media accounts.
